page.title: 15H.B.E Printers of Thornton
page.content: {The printers}get about 4 customers a day. They print technical manuals, colour brochures and general printing. They use large sheets of papers and all colours. Every 2 years they change their machines. They have had their fading machine 2 months, their machine that processes films and all the other machines 2 years which includes a computer type-setter, 2 printers and a big electric guillotine. It is not a family firm; there are 14 full time employees and 2 part-time employees. They take on someone every 6 months. {H.B.E printers}do designing and also printing. The customers vary widely and they have 3 trainees. Recently they have moved premises from and older building within Pickering to a newly-constructed{industrial estate}on the eastern outskirts of the town.
